main event: An unidentified, bright green, round object with a tail was observed traveling at high speed on a downward course near Travis AFB, California on January 4, 1952.
interesting points: The object was seen at low elevation,The observation duration was 25-30 seconds,The description of the object resembled a large meteor,Several military personnel reported a hovering object emitting bright light at Travis AFB,The sighting was made by Lt. William J. Callan Jr., who noted the unusual behavior of the object.
sighted object: bright green round object with a tail
witness description: Lt. William J. Callan Jr., airman assigned to the organization
